def_en: Bingo is a game in which each player has a card with numbers on. Someone calls out numbers and if you are the first person to have all your numbers called out, you win the game.

def_cn: （表示惊喜）太好了,好极了,妙极了
def_en: You can say 'bingo!' when something pleasant happens, especially in a surprising, unexpected, or sudden way.
